name: Monster Fighter Demo
description:
Welcome to an awesome world  Where fluffy monster fighting for the glory and supremacy!!

Is a fighting game for 2 players in the same device. You can play with family and friends in funny battles with 2 monster of 12 and 1 stage of 12. 

For Android Systems  4.1 ~ 7

When we can publish this game, it  will contain a Online mode and Tournament mode. Our first step is to make people to know the game early to publish it on Play Store.

For iOS Systems...

In a future will release the game on iOS device.
